titleStmt.title: SII 7.409: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 409. (A.R. No. 197 of 1901). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇara vurimayiṟ ciran=ta maṇimuṭi cūṭi minavar nilaikeṭa villavar kulaitara Eṉai manna
va ririyaluṟ ṟuḻitarat tikkaṉaittum tan cakkara naṭātti vijaiAbhiṣehaM paṇṇi virasiṁhāsanattu Avaṉimuḻutumuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟirun=taruḷiya kovirājakecaripatmarāṉa cakkara
vattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟkku yāṇṭu 4 10 1Āvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭukkoṭṭattu Ūṟṟukkāṭṭunāṭṭuk kulottuṅkacoḻaccaturvetimaṅ
kalattu peruṅkuṟi sabhaiyom pūmi nilavilaiyāvaṇak kaiyyeḻuttu nammūrt ti śvaramuṭaiyarkku tiruAttacāmattukku tiruamutukku Arici kuṟuṇikkum piḷḷaiyārkku Arici
Irunāḻikkum nellu mukkuṟuṇi Orunāḻiyum kaṟiyamutu mūṉṟukku nellu mun=nāḻi mutu Āḻaākkukku nellu mun=nāḻiyum tayiramutukku nellu Irunāḻiyum miḷakamutukku nellu nā
ḻiyum Uppamutukku nellu Uriyum Aṭaikkāyamutu pākku pattukkum veṟṟilai nāṟpatukku nel lirunāḻiyum mañcaḷkāppukku nel luriyum tirumaṭaippaḷḷikku viṟakukku
nel nāḻiyum kucakkalattukku nel nāḻiyum tirumeypūccukku nel mun=nāḻiyum citārikku nel lirunāḻiyum tirupparicaṭṭa miraṇṭukku nel mun=nāḻiyum madhyānasandhikku tumpait tiruppaḷḷittāmam nāḻikku ne
l nāḻiyum pūjippārkku nel nānāḻiyum tirumañcaṇam vaippārkku nel lirunāḻiyum tiruppatiyam viṇṇappañceyvārkku nelluk kuṟuṇiyum san=tiviḷakku nāṟpatukku nellu mukkuṟuṇiyum tiruṉan=tā viḷakku Oṉṟukku nellu kuṟuṇiyum ciṟukālaisan=ti man=tiraponakattukku Arici nāṉāḻikku nelluk kuṟuṇi Irunāḻiyum
kaṟiyamutu neyyamutu Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭuvaṉattukku nellu Aṟunāḻiyum Ippaṭi niman=tam cellakkaṭavatākavum Itdevar koyilile karuṇākarancālai Agrabhojanattukku kalam Aiñcukku Arici kuṟuṇi yirunāḻikkum nellu mukkuṟuṇi Oru nāḻiyum kaṟi muṉṟukku nel mun=nāḻiyum morukku nel lirunāḻiyum Uppukku nel nāḻiyum ney Āḻaākkukku nellu mun=nā
ḻiyum pākkup pattukkum veṟṟilai nāṟpatukkum nel lirunāḻiyum Aṭuvānukku nelluk kuṟuṇiyum kucakkalattukku nel nāḻiyum viṟakukku nel nāḻiyum Ippaṭi Uṇṇakkaṭavatākak kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu viḻupparaiyanāṭṭu neṟkuṉṟanāṭṭuk kuṭāmūruṭaiyān veḷān caṅkaranārāyaṇan koṇṭu viṭṭa caṅkaranārāyaṇaviḷākamāvatu vaṭapāṟkellai Itde
var devatānamāna Eṟucevakaviḷākattukkut teṟkum kiḻpāṟkellai toḷḷākuḻi Ellaiyil Īñcalukku meṟkum tenpāṟkellai toḷḷākuḻiyil teṟki liñcalil meṟkunokkiṉa kottārattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai teviyarumpākkattu Ellaikkuk kiḻakkum In=nāṉkellaikkum Uṭpaṭṭa nilam Ivvāṇṭaikku munpu tarattilum parappilum U
ṭal peṟātu kāṭukoḷāyt taramiṉṟiye brāmmaṇaṟku kūṟiṭumaṉṟiye kiṭan=ta nilaṅ kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu viḻupparaiyanāṭṭu neṟkuṉṟanāṭṭuk kuṭāmūruṭaiyāṉ veḷān caṅkaranārāyaṇanukku Emmi licain=ta vilaipporuḷ muṟṟu maṟakkoṇṭu viṟṟukkuṭuttom kulottuṅkacoḻaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom In=nilattukku Aḻivuceyvārum ceyya
niṉaittārum geṅkaiiṭaik kumariiṭaic ceytār ceyta pāvam Anupavikkakaṭavatākavum Iṉnilattukku nirvilai An=ta rāyaṅ koḷḷakkaṭavomallātomākavum Innilatti liruppāraic cilliṟai coṟumāṭṭu vācaṟkācu Āḷamañci koḷḷakkaṭavomallātomākavūm sammatittu paṇiyāl Ivvūrk kaṇakkaṉ kumāracatti tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyān Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.409 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
